name: Aqua Lace Cowgirl Canteen™ Designer hip flask for women
description:
Perfect for a bridal party, bachelorette, birthday and Christmas gifts, this Cowgirl Canteen™ is an 8oz Stainless Steel hip flask with a custom fabric sleeve that removes easily for filling and washing. Matching or coordinating sets are available at a discount for bridal party gifts.
 
This listing is only for the Aqua Lace Cowgirl Canteen™. Every Original Cowgirl Canteen™ comes with a sewn in Farrier's Daughter label.
 
The Farrier's Daughter™ is happy to ship outside of the US, please email me for shipping rates.
 
***All content and designs copyright 2011 by The Farrier's Daughter™
